hero.title: Welcome to Our Italian Restaurant
hero.description: Enjoy the real taste of Italy in every bite.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Our restaurant was founded with the goal of bringing authentic Italian cuisine to our town. With a team of dedicated chefs and a cozy ambiance, we hope to provide an unforgettable dining experience for all our guests.
